debounce.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Only valid when using `NATIVE` debounce mode. Configures the debounce time on the sensor to reduce noise and false detections. Defaults to `1ms`.

*See also: [Qwiic PIR Motion Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/qwiic_pir.html#configuration-variables)*

debounce_mode.docs:
**enum**: How the component debounces the motion sensor’s signal. Must be one of `HYBRID`, `NATIVE`, or `RAW`. See [Debounce Modes](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/qwiic_pir.html#debounce-modes) for details. Defaults to `HYBRID`.

*See also: [Qwiic PIR Motion Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/qwiic_pir.html#configuration-variables)*
